author: Vertyco
description: Ark: Survival Evolved server manager and crosschat.
end_user_data_statement: This cog may use considerable network traffic over time depending on how many servers you have.\nThis cog stores Gamertag Names, time played per map, and optional token data for Xbox self-host accounts.
install_msg: Thank you for installing! Use `[p]arktools` and `[p]help ArkTools` for more info.\n**Disclosure:** This cog may use considerable network traffic over time depending on how many servers you have.\nThis cog stores Gamertag Names, time played per map, and optional token data for Xbox self-host accounts.
